title: Post-doc in Mathematics (Algebraic Geometry)
field: Algebra, Applied Mathematics, Geometry and Topology,
job_description:
The University of Luxembourg is looking for its Faculty of Science, Technology and Medicine, Department of Mathematics, a Post-doc in Mathematics (Algebraic Geometry).

Your Role...

  • Research in one or more of the following topics: derived algebraic geometry, moduli spaces of representations, categorification, derived categories
  • Teaching activity of 2-4 hours per week
  • Active participation in and support of the organization of the activities of the research group

What we expect from youâ¦

  • PhD (not dating back more than 7 years) of high quality
  • Research experience in at least one of the above mentioned topics
  • Very good written and oral skills in English

We offer...

  • Outstanding research conditions in an international and inspiring environment
  • Possibility to become a member of a young team of dedicated researchers
  • The yearly gross salary for every Postdoctoral researcher at the UL is 75 285 â¬

In Short...

  • Contract type: 12 months fixed-term contract, with possible prolongation to 24 or 36 months
  • Work hours: Full time 40 hours / week
  • Foreseen starting date: July 2022
  • Location: Belval
  • Job reference: UOL04744

How to apply...

Applications should include:

  • Detailed curriculum vitae (including publication list)
  • Names of two referees
  • Copies of relevant certificates
  • Research program

Early application is highly encouraged, as the applications will be processed upon reception. Please apply ONLINE formally through the HR system. Applications by email will not be considered.

The University of Luxembourg embraces inclusion and diversity as key values. We are fully committed to removing any discriminatory barrier related to gender, and not only, in recruitment and career progression of our staff.
